name: Search
deprecationMessage: Please don't use the search factory. It will be refactored soon.

properties.name: icon
properties.description: The icon for the search. Defaults to the search icon. (optional)
properties.rawdescription: The icon for the search. Defaults to the search icon. (optional)

properties.name: injector
properties.description: Used to load the providers for the components. If not provided, default injector us used.
properties.rawdescription: Used to load the providers for the components. If not provided, default injector us used.

properties.name: priority
properties.rawdescription: Ordering of the actions (high number first) (optional)

properties.name: template
properties.rawdescription: Angular template used for Content Projection (optional)

properties.name: term
properties.description: The default search term. Defaults to an empty string (optional=)
properties.rawdescription: The default search term. Defaults to an empty string (optional=)

description: The search is an icon that appears on the upper right corner and opens a template or a search bar on click on it.
rawdescription:
The search is an icon that appears on the upper right corner
and opens a template or a search bar on click on it.

methods.name: onSearch
methods.rawdescription: A function triggers if the user performance a search.
methods.description: A function triggers if the user performance a search.
